      Returns:

      Returns:
      Authentication prompt message.

      Authenticate a user based on provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      credentials - Map containing the username and password.
      Returns:
      Response message indicating authentication status.

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/api/users") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<User>> getAllUsers()
      Retrieve a list of all registered users. This endpoint is intended for admin-only access.
      Returns:
      List of all users.

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("/api/users/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<User> getUserById(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Retrieve details of a specific user based on their ID. This endpoint is intended for admin-only access.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user.
      Returns:
      User details.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/api/users/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateUser(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody User userUpdates)
      Update details of a specific user based on their ID. This endpoint is intended for admin-only access.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user.
      userUpdates - Updated user details.
      Returns:
      Response message indicating update status.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/api/users/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Delete a specific user based on their ID. This endpoint is intended for admin-only access.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user.
      Returns:
      Response message indicating deletion status.
